org.robobrain.sdk.graphics
Class Color

java.lang.Object
  org.robobrain.sdk.graphics.Color
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Color
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

The Color class encapsulates a 32bit RGBA color.

Author:
James Johnson

Color

public Color(float r,
             float g,
             float b,
             float a)
Initializes the Color to a specific value.

Parameters:
r - The amount of Red, from 0.0f - 1.0f.
g - The amount of Green, from 0.0f - 1.0f.
b - The amount of Blue, from 0.0f - 1.0f.
a - The amount of transparency (Alpha), from 0.0f - 1.0f.
